options.option: Use a transient compset so we allocate and run all PFTs (non-transient cases only allocate memory for non-zero-weight PFTs)
Transient case with isotopes with a december start
NOTE(bja, 201509) constrain_stress_deciduous_onset is on by default for clm50, but functionality is not exercised by nine day tests, Sean Swenson verified that it is active during 30 day tests.
Want ERP _D test with irrigation on
Include an irrigation test with RTM to test irrigation-river feedbacks with that component
Do a test with RTM and flooding on as that also impacts CLM code
Multi-year global test of transient crops together with transient glaciers. Use no-evolve glaciers with ERP test
include a debug test of I1850Clm45Bgc
include a debug test of I2000Clm45Sp
Include a few debug tests of Cn
include a debug test of IHistClm45BgcCruGs
include a debug test with flooding on
cism is not answer preserving across processor changes, but short test length should be ok.
include a debug test of I1850Clm45BgcCrop
Want a multi-year global crop restart test; this was 5 years when we were doing cold start, but 3 years is probably sufficient given that we have spun-up crop initial conditions
Want a multi-year global crop restart test; this was 5 years when we were doing cold start, but 3 years is probably sufficient given that we have spun-up crop initial conditions
test transient PFTs (via HIST) in conjunction with changing glacier area
Tests updates of BGC variables with increasing and decreasing glacier areas
Transient crop run with a mid-year restart, restarting shortly after a big landunit transition, to make sure that the annually-dribbled fluxes generated from landunit transitions restart properly

tests mid-year restart, with the restart file being written in the middle of the first year; 12-15-2017: now that we generally use init_interp, this test needs to be changed to point to a blank finidat file to truly test mid-year restart in the first year
tests mid-year restart, with the restart file being written in the middle of the second year
tests mid-year restart, with the restart file being written after more than 2 years, which Sam Levis says is important for testing crop restarts

Include a long ERS test of the cmip6 configuration, though at coarse resolution. This gives a year+ test covering the output_crop usermod, which is something we want: if this is removed, we should add a test of at least a year duration covering the output_crop usermod. This test needs to use init_interp to work, because of adding virtual Antarctica columns (currently the default out-of-the-box setting uses init_interp for this).
restart is right before the transition from 100% nat veg to 100% crop
Multi-year global test of transient crops together with transient glaciers. Use glacier evolution with ERS test
Want a multi-year global test of transient crops; also want a multi-year transient restart test. Using P60x1 and ERS rather than ERP to get faster turnaround of this long-running test
include a long Clm45 test, and include a production intel test of Clm45
restart is right before increasing natural veg to > 0 while also shifting PCT_CFT

Want to cover both glc_mec and crop in an LII test; this test covers both. Uses a year-2000 restart file so that the restart file has non-zero product pools, so that we exercise the gridcell-level code in init_interp. 2018-04-09: Now that SGLC tests use glc_mec, it would be more straightforward to run this test using a SGLC compset rather than a CISM compset that turns off two-way coupling; I was going to make that change now, but didn't want to risk it given the current time crunch, so let's make that change later.
Exercise the init_interp_method='use_finidat_areas' option. See documentation at the top of the python script implementing this test for more details and rationale.

Include one LVG debug test (exact configuration is not very important). Note that the LVG test will fail if there is any 1-d output, or output separated by glacier elevation classes (e.g., the various *_FORC fields), so this includes a testmod that turns off any 1-d output.

The main purpose of this test is to test threading of init_interp, exercising the OpenMP directives in initInterp. (Note that ERP tests don't compare threaded vs. non-threaded runs of init_interp, since init_interp won't run in the restart case.) Note that this test will use init_interp as long as we don't have out-of-the-box initial conditions at f10 resolution. We could probably get a similar level of confidence in the threading directives by deleting this test and instead changing the LII test to use threading; the main loss would be that that wouldn't test threading combined with interpolating from one resolution to another, as this one does.
Include at least one production test with Cn
include a nag debug test of Clm45BgcCrop
Want a debug test that tests a number of aspects of transient crops, including a new crop landunit and shifting PCT_CFT; move to CLM50 once we can get it fast enough (see bug 2391)
Want nag _D test with irrigation on
include a production gnu test of Clm45

This gives a short debug test of the cmip6 configuration as well as a test of the cmip6 configuration at the production resolution, both of which we want. This test needs to use init_interp to work, because of adding virtual Antarctica columns (currently the default out-of-the-box setting uses init_interp for this).
Transient production low res future scenario case with isotopes with a december 2050 start

nlevsno less than 5 is not important scientifically, but is useful for making sure no code assumes that there are 5 snow layers (because this should result in an array bounds exception); this test can be removed once CLM5 is released and most new branches are based off of CLM5 (which will have a runtime-set number of snow layers, rather than assuming 5 snow layers)... until then, I want this test to catch any new code that assumes 5 snow layers
include a relatively long crop test at relatively high resolution

Long enough test for SMB to be generated in bare land areas; add a month beyond the 3rd year to allow time for CLM to respond to CISM forcing from the 3rd year. (Note: if we had spun-up initial conditions for an IG compset, we could test this with much shorter test, if it also used the glc override options - much of the need for this long test is to allow the snow pack to spin up.)
Include a few debug tests of Cn

The main point of this test is simply to make sure that the CMIP6WACCMDECK moifierd works. (This configuration is basically the same as I1850Clm50BgcCropCmip6, but without cmip6_glaciers_virtual_antarctica - so we don't need huge coverage of this.) Month-long so that we actually get some history output (because this test exercises a usermods directory with only monthly and yearly output).

Want at least a month-long debug test covering the output_crop usermod, as well as a test covering the output_crop_highfreq usermod. (Note that we already have a year+ test of output_crop via a cmip6 test, so having this test just be a month, rather than a year, seems good enough.)
Want a year-long test covering the output_bgc and output_bgc_highfreq usermods; don't want a highfreq, year-long global test because of the output volume, so this is single-point.
Want a year-long test covering the output_sp and output_sp_highfreq usermods; don't want a highfreq, year-long global test because of the output volume, so this is single-point.
